thread.title: High probability of a Brexit deal with EU, says Davis

title: High probability of a Brexit deal with EU, says Davis
text:
April 25, 2018 / 9:08 AM / Updated a day ago High probability of a Brexit deal with EU, says Davis Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
LONDON (Reuters) - Brexit minister David Davis said on Wednesday he believed that there was a high probability that Britain would negotiate a deal to leave the European Union, dismissing fears that the country could crash out of the bloc. FILE PHOTO - Britain's Secretary of State for Exiting the European Union David Davis arrives in Downing Street, London, April 24, 2018. REUTERS/Henry Nicholls
Telling a parliamentary committee of lawmakers that there was only a tiny probability of a no deal, he said: “I think the massively higher probability is a deal.” Reporting by Andrew MacAskill, writing by Elizabeth Piper
